= Notes

== Summary

Description:: Note container. Added inline within the body text.
Syntax::
* *USFM:* ``++\++``#__noteType__#``++ ++``#__caller__#``++ \cat ++``#__category__#``++\cat* ++``#__content__#``++\++``#__noteType__#``++*++``
* *USX:* ``++<note style="++``#__noteType__#``++" ++``#__@caller @category__#``++>++``#__content__#``++</note>++``
#noteType#::: Note type
include::../nav.adoc[tag=nav-topcat]
#caller# *::: Note caller
** `+` - Caller should be generated by the translation editor or publishing process.
** `-` - No caller.
** `?` - Where  `?` represents the specific character to be used for the caller.
#category#::: Note category.
#content#::: Character types for xref:char:notes/footnote/index.adoc[footnotes] or xref:char:notes/crossref/index.adoc[cross references].
